name: Dwaaltuin
description:
Welcome to Dwaaltuin. A short chess-like puzzler, where you need to guide two characters through a meandering garden.

How to play:

  • Move pieces by selecting them with the mouse and clicking on a highlighted tile.
  • Undo a move by pressing the 'u' key.
  • Restart a level by pressing the 'r' key.

Special thanks to Laurens for creating the poster art and to Mitchell for all the play-testing!

Made by Quinten Heijn and Victor Gladys
